loginMobGuide: Enter your mobile number in the provided field to sign in to your account.
loginBtnGuide: Once you have finished entering all of the details, you can click this button to send OTP on your mobile
serviceListGuide: Here you can find a complete list of all the services offered by the OBYAMI app.
firstNameGuide: Please fill your first name in the given input field.
lastNameGuide: You can enter your last name here.
shopIconGuide: You can click on this icon, to find and shop from sellers in your area.
bankIconGuide: Click on this icon to enter the banking section and use your wallet.
mapComponentGuide: This section offers a map that visualizes all the shops in your neighborhood.
walletOverviewGuide: This shows you an overview of your wallet.
categoryGuide: Utilize the category icons to explore shops and products that align with your interests and are situated nearby.
trendingGuide: Find the most in-demand and well-loved shops near you with the help of this section.
shopListGuide: Discover all the shops in your area by browsing this comprehensive section.
openShopGuide: Click on any shop logo to immerse yourself in their product catalog and discover all they have to offer.
ordersGuide: You can access your order history seamlessly on this page. Each order is organized intuitively with all the necessary information. Simply tap on any order to explore its details.
specialNoteGuide: These special notes provide real-time updates on your pending order, ensuring you stay informed about its status.
shopInfoGuide: In this section, you can find the name and details of the shop where you placed your order.
orderDetailsGuide: In this section, you can view the details of your orders, such as your order number, when you placed it, where it's getting shipped to, and the payment method you used.
itemDetailsGuide: You can easily check the details of your order, including item names, prices, and quantities.
billingDetailsGuide: This section provides a comprehensive overview of your order's billing details, including the subtotal, applicable taxes, any additional charges, and the delivery fee.
bankingBalanceGuide: Get a quick overview of your available funds by checking your wallet balance right here.
bankingActionsGuide: Access a range of quick actions right here, including adding funds to your account or making payments.
recentHistoryGuide: Your recent transactions are conveniently displayed here. To view your entire transaction history, simply click on 'Show All'.
addMoneyGuide: This page allows you to effortlessly top up your wallet. Enter the amount you wish to add and click 'Add Money' to finalize the transaction.
sendMoneyGuide: With our app, you can easily transfer funds to your friends and family right from your phone. Simply select the contact you want to send money to, enter the amount, and tap 'Send.' The recipient will receive the money instantly, and you can track the transaction status in real time.
scanQRGuide: Our app simplifies payments. Simply scan the shop's QR code, align it within the designated area, and enter the payment amount to complete the transaction.
showQRGuide: Easily receive payments from anyone by sharing your unique QR code. This QR code acts as your personal payment address, allowing anyone to scan it and send you money directly to your Obyami wallet.
featuresOfBankingGuide:
Hey there! Welcome to the exciting world of banking with Obyami!

Obyami Wallet puts secure payments at your fingertips. Send money seamlessly to anyone on the Obyami network, all without minimum balance requirements.

Shop faster with convenient checkout and effortlessly pay your bills. Ô∏è

Ready to unlock the power of Obyami Wallet? Simply tap the button below and let's get started!
selectDocumentTypeGuide: Alright, let's move on to KYC. Please select which document you'll be using.
enterIdNumberGuide: In this field, you can type in the unique ID number of the document you selected.
uploadIdProofGuide: Once you're done filling in the details, upload the document proof using this button.
submitAfterVerifiedGuide: Once you've filled in all the required information, tap 'Submit For Verification' to proceed
detailsSubmittedPendingForVerificationGu: Your KYC details are under verification. We'll notify you once it's complete.
setupWalletPinGuide: For your safety and security, let's create a 4-digit PIN for your wallet. This will give you control and access to your banking section.
enterWalletPinGuide: To ensure the safety of your finances, please enter your 4-digit wallet PIN to proceed.
hasTransactionHistoryGuide: Get a glimpse into your spending habits! This is your transaction history, where you can track your past purchases and keep an eye on your budget.
scanOfflineQrGuide: Align the customer's QR code in the center of the scan area to claim the amount from their wallet.
myOfflineQrGuide: Use this QR code to make secure offline payments at Obyami-verified merchants. Simply show your code to the merchant and enter your PIN when prompted.
totalSentAndReceivedThisMonthGuide: This section displays your Obyami wallet data to show you the total amount you've sent and received this month. Keep track of your spending and income easily in one place.
whoYourePayingGuide: This section shows you the details of the user you're about to send money to. Always verify the recipient information carefully before confirming any payment.
enterAmountGuide: This is where you can set the payment amount for the selected user.
transactionIdGuide: This is your transaction ID. You can find it here anytime you need to track your transaction or contact support.
statusGuide: Transparency is our middle name. Here you can see the real-time status of your transaction, ensuring you always know exactly what's happening.
paymentDetailsGuide: This section provides a detailed breakdown of your recent payment transaction, including the recipient, amount, date, and time.
linkedBankAccountsGuide: This option will show you all the banks you've linked to your Obyami wallet. These linked banks can be used to withdraw money from your Obyami wallet conveniently.
walletDetailsGuide: Tap here to view your Obyami wallet details including your wallet address, KYC status, and more.
changeWalletPinGuide: You can use this option to change the PIN used for accessing your wallet.
shopDetailsGuide: This section provides a quick overview of the shop you're ordering from. Take a look!
itemsGuide: Review your items, adjust quantities, or proceed to checkout easily from here.
placeOrderGuide: Click the 'Place order' button to submit your order and complete your purchase.
faqGuide: Have a question? Click here to access our comprehensive FAQs.
queryRelatedToMyAccountGuide: Have an account-related question? Click here to unlock the answer.
paymentRelatedGuide: Click here if you have any questions about your recent payments.
orderRelatedGuide: Need help tracking your order or have any other order-related questions? Click here
contactUsGuide: If you need additional guidance or wish to discuss anything further, feel free to click this button to reach our dedicated agents.
typeHereGuide: Use this field to enter your question, including any relevant details. Press send to begin your chat.
selectOrderOrTransactionGuide: To assist you efficiently, please select the order or transaction you have a query about from the list below. This will help our agent better understand your request and provide accurate support.
viewProfileGuide: This is where you can edit your profile details, such as your name, email address, and preferences.
favoriteGuide: Click here to quickly access all your favorite shops and products!
bankingShortcutsGuide: Tap here to reveal handy shortcuts for transfer, scan and pay, and passbook, making your banking experience even smoother.
shopShortcutsGuide: Unlock a faster shopping journey! Click to access shortcuts for order history, cart, favorites, and explore.
customerSupportGuide: Get instant answers to your questions! Click 'Here' to visit our Customer Support page.
languageGuide: Click here to access a wide variety of languages and personalize your app experience.
logoutGuide: Ready to log out? Click here to log out your account from this device.
shopActionsGuide: This section gives you quick access to everything you need to manage your store. You can view your orders, update your store details, and more.
openWalletGuide: Click here to easily create your Obyami wallet and join the exciting world of digital payments and rewards.
manageOrdersGuide: When you receive a new order, a notification will instantly pop up, giving you the chance to accept or decline. This dedicated section provides all the information you need, including customer details, order number, date and time, delivery distance, and even billing information. Manage your orders seamlessly and efficiently, all within the app!
addProductGuide: Ready to take your store to the next level? With just a tap, you can add more exciting products and entice more customers to discover your unique offerings.
manageProductsGuide: This section offers a comprehensive overview of your product details, allowing you to manage your inventory with ultimate flexibility. From toggling product availability to editing information and even deleting items, you have complete control right at your fingertips.
howShopLooksGuide: Take a sneak peek at how your shop appears to potential customers
editGuide: Take control of your shop's presentation! Customize your name, upload a captivating image, and update your address - all with a single tap
closeOpenGuide: Control your shop's visibility and open/close it using this button.
enterShopDetailGuide: Complete your shop registration and unlock a world of opportunity. Fill in your shop details below to join our network of successful sellers and begin reaching new customers.
shopNameGuide: To register your shop and unlock exclusive features, enter your official shop name here.
streetGuide: Enter your shop's street name here
landmarkGuide: Please enter a nearby landmark in this field
natureOfBusinessGuide: Tell us whether you operate a mobile business (with a moving cart) or have a fixed location. This helps us connect you with the right opportunities!
shopPhotoGuide: Use this field to upload your logo or image to give your shop a unique visual identity and attract customers! Ô∏è
shopLocationGuide: Adjust your shop's location on the map so nearby customers can find you!
payOnboardingFeeGuide: Congratulations! Your shop is registered. Start listing products by paying your onboarding fees using this button.
